MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW10 postcode area of Middlewich, affecting properties in Brooks Lane, Cledford Lane and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.51am. We have unconfirmed reports of a 3rd party damage to our equipment and we suspect that your property is affected by this. Our engineers are on their way to confirm this report and the team will work get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12noon. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.28am on 11th of Jan 2021.
